translation.en: Cops found him dead in a subway station in Harlem.
translation.zh: 警察在哈莱姆区地铁站发现他死了

translation.en: I never liked him too much, but poor guy, he didn't deserve to go like that.
translation.zh: 我一直不怎么喜欢他真可怜 他不该死得那么惨的

translation.en: -Did they tell you the cause of death? -What?
translation.zh: 他们有没有告诉你他的死因？ -什么？-他们告诉你他怎么死的吗？

translation.en: -Did they tell you how he died? -No, they wouldn't tell me.
translation.zh: -什么？-他们告诉你他怎么死的吗？ 没有 他们不会告诉我的

translation.en: Mrs. Sapelli is waiting for me at home. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我老婆在等我回家我得走了

translation.en: By the way, about that leak in the basement...
translation.zh: 对了 关于地下室漏水的问题

translation.en: ...they're sending someone over to work on that, beginning of next week.
translation.zh: 他们会派人来修 下周开始弄

translation.en: We have a white male, 50 years of age, name unknown.
translation.zh: 死者是个白人 50岁 姓名不详

translation.en: Following the completion of the external examination...
translation.zh: 根据已完成的外部检查可知

translation.en: ...the body was washed and lightly dried.
translation.zh: 尸体被洗过 放得有些干

translation.en: A Y-incision was made from the bilateral clavicular joints...
translation.zh: 从两边锁骨关节到剑状软骨

translation.en: ...to the xiphoid process.
translation.zh: 有一个Y字切口

translation.en: -The tissue was waterlogged-- -Amy.
translation.zh: -组织浸过水…-艾米

translation.en: Yes, what is it?
translation.zh: 嗯 什么事？

translation.en: There's someone in the lobby for you. It sounds urgent.
translation.zh: 大堂有个人找你 听语气很紧急

translation.en: Ben. What's happening? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 班 怎么回事？你来这里干什么？

translation.en: Thanks for seeing me. Look, I need to ask you a favor.
translation.zh: 谢谢你肯见我听着 我得请你帮个忙

translation.en: -I'm in the middle of work. -I know.
translation.zh: -我正在工作-我知道 20分钟就好

translation.en: Twenty minutes. Yesterday morning you picked up a body.
translation.zh: -我正在工作-我知道 20分钟就好 昨天早上 你们收到了一具尸体

translation.en: Gary Lewis. I just need to take a look at him.
translation.zh: 加里路易斯 我只需要看他一眼

translation.en: -Who is he? -A night watchman at the Mayflower.
translation.zh: -他是谁？-他是个夜班警卫 在五月花工作 我接了他的班

translation.en: I replaced him.
translation.zh: 在五月花工作 我接了他的班

translation.en: How do you have his driver's license?
translation.zh: 你怎么拿到他的驾照的？ 我在百货公司里找到他的钱包听着 我只需知道他是怎么死的

translation.en: I found his wallet in the department store. I just need to know how he died.
translation.zh: 我在百货公司里找到他的钱包听着 我只需知道他是怎么死的

translation.en: Why do you need to know how he died?
translation.zh: 你为何要知道他是怎么死的？

translation.en: You've been suspended, you're not supposed to be doing any investigations.
translation.zh: 班 你被停职了你不该进行任何调查

translation.en: Listen to me, this is serious.
translation.zh: 艾米 求你了听着 事情很严重

translation.en: There are some very strange things happening over at the Mayflower.
translation.zh: 五月花发生了一些很奇怪的事

translation.en: I can't explain what it's--
translation.zh: 我解释不了 但是…

translation.en: This guy Gary Lewis sent me a package right before he died.
translation.zh: 加里路易斯在死前给我寄了个包裹

translation.en: Thing is, I never met him before.
translation.zh: 问题是 我从未见过他

translation.en: Inside the package were all these articles on the Mayflower, on the fire.
translation.zh: 包裹里面全是五月花的报导关于那场火灾的

translation.en: Like he was trying to tell me something, or warn me about something.
translation.zh: 就像他想告诉我什么或警告我什么

translation.en: I need to figure this out. Please.
translation.zh: 我得弄明白怎么回事 求你了

translation.en: Gary Lewis, Gary Lewis. There he is, B-16.
translation.zh: 加里路易斯 找到了 B-16

translation.en: He slashed his throat.
translation.zh: 他割了自己的喉咙

translation.en: Well, there you go, there's your answer. Your man committed suicide.
translation.zh: 好了 这就是你要的答案这人自杀了

translation.en: You get a lot of suicide cases with people that slash their own throats?
translation.zh: 自杀案件中死者多数是割喉死的吗？

translation.en: I didn't think so. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 我想不是吧 麻烦让一下

translation.en: All I know is, the police are still investigating this one.
translation.zh: 我知道的是 警方还在调查这案子

translation.en: -That's why we still have the body. -What did he use to cut his throat?
translation.zh: 所以尸体还在这里 他用什么割喉的？

translation.en: A piece of a mirror.
translation.zh: 一块镜片

translation.en: He probably broke the mirror into pieces...
translation.zh: 他可能打碎了镜子

translation.en: ...so he'd have something to cut himself with.
translation.zh: 这样他才有东西割自己

translation.en: Seven years bad luck.
translation.zh: 七年的厄运

translation.en: Esseker.
translation.zh: 埃塞克

translation.en: Are you okay, Ben?
translation.zh: 你没事吧 班？

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I'm sorry, excuse me.
translation.zh: 对不起 不好意思

translation.en: I need to see his file.
translation.zh: 我得看看他的档案

translation.en: -What? -I need his file.
translation.zh: -什么？-我要他的档案

translation.en: What's the problem? I just need to see his file.
translation.zh: -班-有什么问题？ 我只是需要看他的档案

translation.en: Calm down. You're not even supposed to be down here.
translation.zh: 冷静点 你本来不能来这里的

translation.en: Now you want to look at somebody's file?
translation.zh: 现在还要看别人的档案？

translation.en: Look, I'll be off then. Amy, you know where to find me if you need me.
translation.zh: 听着 我先走了 艾米 如果你需要我你知道去哪找我

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, Peter. I appreciate it.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 彼得麻烦你了

translation.en: I want you to leave now. I'm serious, Ben. Amy, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -请你马上离开 我说真的 班-艾米 对不起

translation.en: I can't leave here until I see that file.
translation.zh: 看不到档案我不会走

translation.en: It's important, please.
translation.zh: 这很重要 求你了

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Amy. Come here and look at this picture.
translation.zh: 艾米 过来看看这些照片

translation.en: Look at the piece of mirror that Gary Lewis is holding.
translation.zh: 看看加里路易斯拿着的镜片

translation.en: And look at it up here in its reflected image in the other mirror.
translation.zh: 然后看看它反射在镜子里的影像

translation.en: It's full of blood.
translation.zh: 满是血

translation.en: Yet in reality, it's perfectly clean. Not a single drop on it.
translation.zh: 但实际上镜片很干净 没一滴血上面一滴血也没有

translation.en: It's probably the angle from which the photograph was taken.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？可能是照片拍摄的角度问题

translation.en: What are you trying to prove?
translation.zh: 你想证明什么？

translation.en: What if the mirrors are showing us something that's not really happening?
translation.zh: 如果镜子显示给我们的并不是真正发生的事情呢？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Just listen to me.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-不 听我说

translation.en: What if the mirrors are reflecting something that's beyond our reality?
translation.zh: 如果镜子显示的是超越现实的事呢？

translation.en: What if the mirrors can actually make us do things that we don't want to do?
translation.zh: 如果镜子能让我们做自己不想做的事呢？

translation.en: Like making Gary Lewis slit his own throat.
translation.zh: 就像让加里路易斯割自己的喉咙

translation.en: Ben, listen to yourself. You can't talk like that around here.
translation.zh: 班 听听你自己你在这里不能这样说话

translation.en: Don't you want to get reinstated?
translation.zh: 你不想复职了？

translation.en: Amy, I'm seeing things in the mirrors at work, bad things.
translation.zh: 艾米 工作时我在镜里看到东西 很坏的事情

translation.en: To the point where I can feel what they're showing me.
translation.zh: 我能感受到它们显示给我看的事情

translation.en: Ben, you're driving me fucking crazy! I don't have time for this.
translation.zh: 班 你要把我逼疯了我没时间跟你玩这个

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么了？

translation.en: Do you think I'm making this up? Do you think I'm fucking lying?
translation.zh: 你认为这是我编出来的吗？你认为我在说谎？

translation.en: What medication are you taking to stop drinking?
translation.zh: 你在服用什么戒酒药？

translation.en: That's a strong drug.
translation.zh: 这种药效力很强

translation.en: It has a lot of serious side effects. How many pills are you taking a day?
translation.zh: 有许多严重的副作用你一天吃多少粒？

translation.en: I'm sorry that I bothered you.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你了

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Thanks for trying to help.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的帮忙

translation.en: --at night at this bar, it's a couple blocks from here.
translation.zh: …晚上在这间酒吧距离这里有两个街区远

translation.en: All right. Where's the body?
translation.zh: -好的 尸体在哪儿？-冷静点

translation.en: -How am I gonna calm down? -Let the detective by. Step over here.
translation.zh: -我做不到 叫我怎么冷静？-让警探过去 站过来

translation.en: And there's a guy been living with her at her place.
translation.zh: 还有个男人住在她家 有一个男人

translation.en: All right. You say she works at this bar? At night?
translation.zh: 好的 你说她晚上在这间酒吧工作？

translation.en: Yeah, she works nights.
translation.zh: 是的 她上夜班 晚上才出去

translation.en: She comes home late. I don't see her come home.
translation.zh: 她很晚才回家 我没看到她回家

translation.en: She probably closes the bar, right?
translation.zh: 她可能是负责关门的 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Because she sleeps during the day, like early morning hours.
translation.zh: 是的 因为她白天睡觉大清早的时候

translation.en: All right. And....
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I saw blood falling from the ceiling. Then she call me.
translation.zh: 我看到天花板滴血 后来她叫我

translation.en: I want you to ask her, did she hear any noises? Any sounds?
translation.zh: 你帮我问问她她有没有听到什么声响？

translation.en: -What's going on? -We'll be with you in just a second.
translation.zh: -发生什么事了？-等一下 没事的 我住在八号房我以前是警察

translation.en: I live in Apartment 8. I used to be a cop. Just tell me what's going on.
translation.zh: 没事的 我住在八号房我以前是警察 -告诉我发生什么事了-请等一下

translation.en: -Just a second. -I want to talk to the lead detective!
translation.zh: -告诉我发生什么事了-请等一下 我要跟负责本案的警探说话安琪拉

translation.en: Angela?
translation.zh: 我要跟负责本案的警探说话安琪拉

translation.en: Who is the lead detective? Ben.
translation.zh: -谁是负责本案的警探？-班

translation.en: Larry, what the hell are you doing here?
translation.zh: 拉瑞 你来这里干什么？

translation.en: -Larry, just tell me what's going on! -Ben, it's not good.
translation.zh: -拉瑞 告诉我发生什么事了-班 事情很糟糕

translation.en: Where's Angie?
translation.zh: 安琪在哪？

translation.en: Where the fuck is my sister? Tell them to let go of me!
translation.zh: 我妹妹在哪？让他们放开我

translation.en: I can't do that, Ben! Goddamn it!
translation.zh: -我不能这样 班-真该死

translation.en: The water has obliterated most of the marks.
translation.zh: 水冲淡了大部分的痕迹

translation.en: No sign of struggle or forced entry.
translation.zh: 没有强行闯入的迹象

translation.en: And the front door was locked, which means that...
translation.zh: 前门锁了 也就是说

translation.en: ...the person who did this either had keys to the apartment...
translation.zh: 凶手要么有房子的钥匙

translation.en: -...or it was someone that she knew. -He would've never laid a finger on her.
translation.zh: 要么是她认识的人 他绝不会伤害她

translation.en: You know, when their father died, Ben took care of Angela.
translation.zh: 他们的父亲死后 班就照顾安琪拉

translation.en: She meant the world to him.
translation.zh: 她就是他的一切 听着 到目前为止他的口供和事实相符

translation.en: Listen, so far, his statement is pretty consistent with the facts, you know?
translation.zh: 听着 到目前为止他的口供和事实相符

translation.en: We checked it out. He showed up to work at 7 p.m.
translation.zh: 我们查过了 他晚上七点去上班

translation.en: The downstairs neighbors said they began to notice the water leakage at around 10.
translation.zh: 楼下邻居说 他们在十点左右发现漏水

translation.en: The only strange thing, and this could just be a coincidence...
translation.zh: 唯一奇怪的是 这也可能是巧合

translation.en: ...is that Ben told the daytime security guard, Lorenzo Sapelli...
translation.zh: 班告诉日班警卫洛兰佐萨皮里

translation.en: ...that he was planning on quitting the job.
translation.zh: 他想辞掉那份工作

translation.en: Like he was moving away some place. He mention anything like that to you?
translation.zh: 他要搬去其他地方他跟你说过这件事吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Lately, communication hasn't been our strong point.
translation.zh: 最近 我们没有很好地沟通

translation.en: What are you gonna do with him?
translation.zh: 你们打算拿他怎么办？

translation.en: Let him go. We got no reason to keep him.
translation.zh: 我们会放他走 我们没理由拘留他

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 拉瑞

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很遗憾

translation.en: Ben?
translation.zh: 班？

translation.en: Why don't you come home and spend some days with the kids?
translation.zh: 你回家和孩子过几天吧

translation.en: I can't.
translation.zh: 我不可以

translation.en: I don't want to put our children in danger.
translation.zh: 我不想危及到孩子

translation.en: She asked me to quit, but I wouldn't.
translation.zh: 她让我辞职 但我没有

translation.en: They came after her. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -他们追杀他-你在说什么？

translation.en: I've got some things I need to take care of.
translation.zh: 我还有些事要处理

translation.en: Wait, Ben. -Please. -Amy, let me go.
translation.zh: -等等 班 求你了-艾米 让我走

translation.en: I don't want you to get in any more trouble. Please, stay out of it.
translation.zh: 我不想你再惹什么麻烦 -别管那事了-我知道是谁做的

translation.en: I know who did this.
translation.zh: -别管那事了-我知道是谁做的

translation.en: In that case, you've gotta tell Larry everything.
translation.zh: 要是那样 你就得告诉拉瑞所有事

translation.en: He'll never believe me.
translation.zh: 他绝不会相信我的

translation.en: Neither will you.
translation.zh: 你也一样

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你到底想要什么？

translation.en: Please, just tell me.
translation.zh: 求你了 告诉我

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你到底想要我怎么样？

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你到底想要我怎么样？

translation.en: Esseker.
translation.zh: “埃塞克”

translation.en: Hey. I need you to run a name for me. Esseker.
translation.zh: 帮我查个名字 埃塞克

translation.en: Echo, Sierra, Sierra, Echo, Kilo, Echo, Romeo.
translation.zh: 埃及的埃 塞外的塞外 克服的克

translation.en: Did you check online? I've already done that.
translation.zh: -你上网查过了吗？-我已经试过了

translation.en: Nothing. IRS and DMV.
translation.zh: 什么都没有 查查国税局和车管局

translation.en: -Where? -Try New York.
translation.zh: -哪里？-试试纽约

translation.en: -When? -Last five or six years.
translation.zh: -时间？-最近五到六年

translation.en: Okay, Ben.
translation.zh: 好的 班

translation.en: Thanks. Get back to me as soon as you can.
translation.zh: 谢谢 尽快回复我

translation.en: "Mayflower burns, 48 presumed dead."
translation.zh: “五月花烧毁 估计有48人死亡”

translation.en: "Berry confesses deadly Mayflower fire."
translation.zh: “贝利承认自己是五月花致命火灾的罪魁祸首”

translation.en: "Watchman arrested."
translation.zh: “警卫被逮捕”

translation.en: "Woman, three children murdered." Come on, Ben, connect the dots.
translation.zh: “一个女人和三名儿童被杀”快点 班 搞清楚怎么回事

translation.en: "Mr. Berry maintains that the mirrors in the store are the ones...
translation.zh: “贝利先生坚持说百货公司里的镜子

translation.en: ...that brutally killed his wife and three children."
translation.zh: 残忍地杀害了他妻子和三个孩子”

translation.en: "Mirrors are guilty. Mirrors are guilty."
translation.zh: “镜子有罪”

translation.en: -Yeah. What did you get? -Hey.
translation.zh: -好的 查到什么了？-嘿

translation.en: Look, I didn't find anything under that name.
translation.zh: 听着 那名字什么也查不到

translation.en: Shit! Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Do you want me to look outside New York?
translation.zh: 要我查纽约以外的地方吗？

translation.en: No. Hold on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 不用 等等

translation.en: I want you to run another name for me. Berry, Terrence Berry.
translation.zh: 帮我查另一个名字贝利 特伦斯贝利

translation.en: Terrence Berry.
translation.zh: 特伦斯贝利

translation.en: Wait one sec.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: I think I got him. You still there? Yeah.
translation.zh: -我找到他了 你还在吗？-是的

translation.en: Your guy murdered his whole family. I already know that.
translation.zh: -那人杀了他全家-我早就知道了

translation.en: He's dead.
translation.zh: 他死了

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 真该死

translation.en: Can you tell me where he was committed before he died?
translation.zh: 能告诉我他死前被关在哪里吗？

translation.en: When one starts to perceive one's own reflection as a completely separate being...
translation.zh: 卡森先生当一个人开始认为自己的倒影 （精神病拘留所） 是完全独立的存在

translation.en: ...one is suddenly confronted with two entirely separate egos...
translation.zh: 他突然要面对两个完全独立的自我

translation.en: ...two entirely separate worlds that can surface at any given moment.
translation.zh: 两个完全独立的世界随时会浮现出来

translation.en: A feeling of self-hatred, usually triggered by a psychological shock...
translation.zh: 一种自我憎恨的感觉通常由某种心理创伤触发

translation.en: ...can split the personality in two...
translation.zh: 会将人格一分为二

translation.en: ...hence creating two or more personalities with distinct memories...
translation.zh: 因而会在同一个人中产生两个或以上的人格

translation.en: ...and distinct behavior patterns within the same individual.
translation.zh: 拥有不同记忆和不同的行为模式

translation.en: The patient then has the false perception of the existence...
translation.zh: 病人出现错觉认为有两个不同的世界存在

translation.en: ...of two distinct worlds: the real world and the world inside a mirror.
translation.zh: 真实的世界和镜子里的世界

translation.en: These recordings were used in Terrence's trial.
translation.zh: 这些录像带在特伦斯庭审中用过

translation.en: You'll see they speak for themselves.
translation.zh: 你一看就会知道

translation.en: Why did you set the department store on fire?
translation.zh: 你为什么要放火烧百货公司？ 为了烧毁那些镜子

translation.en: In order to destroy the mirrors.
translation.zh: 为了烧毁那些镜子

translation.en: Only fire can destroy mirrors, isn't that right, doctor?
translation.zh: 只有火才能毁掉镜子是吧 医生？

translation.en: What made you think you absolutely had to destroy those mirrors, Terrence?
translation.zh: 你凭什么认为一定得毁掉那些镜子 特伦斯？

translation.en: They killed my Helen... ...and my three children.
translation.zh: 它们杀了我的海伦和我的三个孩子

translation.en: For what reason? Why would mirrors want to kill your family?
translation.zh: 因为什么？ 镜子为什么要杀死你的家人？

translation.en: -Because I didn't.... -Didn't do what?
translation.zh: -因为我没有…-没有什么？

translation.en: They asked me to find Esseker.
translation.zh: 它们叫我找到埃塞克

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -We all are looking for Esseker. -Amy.
translation.zh: 我们都在找埃塞克 艾米

translation.en: Excuse me, I have to go.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我得走了

translation.en: Tell me about Esseker, Terrence. Who is Esseker?
translation.zh: 跟我说说埃塞克特伦斯 谁是埃塞克？

translation.en: I don't know who Esseker is!
translation.zh: 我不知道埃塞克是谁

translation.en: I don't know who Esseker is!
translation.zh: 我不知道埃塞克是谁

translation.en: I don't know!
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Mrs. Carson? It's Rosa.
translation.zh: 卡森太太？我是罗莎

translation.en: Mr. Ben is here. He's moving all of the furniture around.
translation.zh: 班先生在这里他把家具搬来搬去的

translation.en: Hey. How was school today? Good.
translation.zh: -嘿 今天上学怎么样？-很好

translation.en: Good. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 好的 我很快回来

translation.en: Dad?
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Sweetheart, give me a second. I gotta take care of a couple things.
translation.zh: 宝贝 等我一下我得处理一些事

translation.en: Daddy, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你在干什么？

translation.en: Honey, don't look scared. Everything's fine.
translation.zh: 宝贝 别怕 没事

translation.en: I think it looks nicer like this. Don't you?
translation.zh: 我觉得这样更好看 不觉得吗？

translation.en: Rosa, what's happening?
translation.zh: 罗莎 发生什么事了？

translation.en: Take the kids downstairs, right now. Right now!
translation.zh: 马上带孩子们去楼下

translation.en: What the hell are you doing?
translation.zh: 你到底在干什么？

translation.en: You're gonna have to trust me, this is for your own protection.
translation.zh: 艾米 你一定得信我这是为了保护你们

translation.en: Get out of the house, right now.
translation.zh: 马上离开这里

translation.en: Are you listening to me?
translation.zh: 嘿 有听我说吗？你吓着孩子了

translation.en: You are scaring the kids. If you don't leave immediately...
translation.zh: 嘿 有听我说吗？你吓着孩子了 如果你不马上离开 我就报警了

translation.en: ...I'm calling the police and you will never see your kids again.
translation.zh: 我警告你 你以后都见不到孩子

translation.en: Amy, I am not crazy. These mirrors are dangerous.
translation.zh: 艾米 我没疯 这些镜子很危险

translation.en: At first, I thought it was just the ones in the store, but after Angela was killed...
translation.zh: 刚开始我以为只是百货公司里的镜子安琪拉被杀后

translation.en: ...I realized they can get at you anywhere.
translation.zh: 我发现到它们到哪里都能抓到你

translation.en: I promise I will leave the house, just let me cover these damn mirrors.
translation.zh: 我答应你 我会离开这房子但让我涂完这些鬼镜子

translation.en: What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么了？

translation.en: I know what you've been going through hasn't been easy.
translation.zh: 我知道你最近很不好受

translation.en: But guess what. It hasn't been easy for us either.
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？我们也很不好受

translation.en: Angela was a part of our lives too, you know that?
translation.zh: 安琪拉也是我们生命中的一部分你知道吗？

translation.en: It's not fair what you're doing to us, Ben!
translation.zh: 你这样做对我们不公平 班

translation.en: Michael.... He's acting so strange now.
translation.zh: 迈克尔 他的举止行为变得很奇怪

translation.en: He always wants to be alone, he won't talk to me, he's having nightmares.
translation.zh: 他总想独处 不愿跟我说话总做噩梦

translation.en: Ben, your behavior is rubbing off on him.
translation.zh: 班 你的行为在影响他

translation.en: He is 6 years old, I have to protect him.
translation.zh: 他才六岁 我得保护他

translation.en: I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 我想让你看样东西

translation.en: Ben, let go of me!
translation.zh: -班 放开我-你不愿意相信我？

translation.en: You don't want to believe me? Fine, I'll show you.
translation.zh: -班 放开我-你不愿意相信我？ 好 那我给你看

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'll show you!
translation.zh: -你在干什么？-我给你看

translation.en: Are you crazy?!
translation.zh: 你疯了吗？

translation.en: -Have you gone completely mad? -Just wait, you'll see.
translation.zh: -你是不是真的疯了？-等一会 你会看到的

translation.en: -See what? -You'll see.
translation.zh: -看到什么？-你会看到的

translation.en: See what, Ben? What am I supposed to see?
translation.zh: 看到什么 班？我该看到什么？

translation.en: It's not happening.
translation.zh: 没发生

translation.en: It's not happening.
translation.zh: 没发生

translation.en: Amy, I swear to you, at the Mayflower....
translation.zh: 艾米 我向你发誓 在五月花…

translation.en: I am not lying.
translation.zh: 我没撒谎

translation.en: Ben, let's go back inside, okay?
translation.zh: 班 我们进去吧 好吗？

translation.en: Put the gun away.
translation.zh: 把枪放好

translation.en: Listen to me, baby. I want to help you.
translation.zh: 听我说 宝贝 我想帮你

translation.en: Tell the kids I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 告诉孩子们我很抱歉

translation.en: Ben!
translation.zh: 班

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 我的老天

translation.en: Larry, it's me. I need your help again.
translation.zh: 拉瑞 是我 我需要你再帮帮我

translation.en: I'm trying to locate the patient-employee manifest for St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.zh: 我想找圣马修医院的病人职工名单

translation.en: -Where is it? -Where was it? They closed it down.
translation.zh: 医院在哪儿？ 是以前在哪儿 医院关闭了

translation.en: It was in New York, it's where the Mayflower used to be.
translation.zh: 但它在纽约 就在五月花的原址

translation.en: The Mayflower? The department store?
translation.zh: 五月花？那家百货公司吗？

translation.en: Do you know where they'd store records for a hospital...
translation.zh: 那里关闭50多年了

translation.en: ...that's been closed for over 50 years?
translation.zh: 你知道他们会把医院记录放在哪吗？

translation.en: I don't. But I can send someone to city hall to check it out.
translation.zh: 我不知道 但我可以派人到市政厅查 如果是公立医院就有记录告诉我你到底需要什么

translation.en: If it's a public hospital, there'd be a record of it. Tell me exactly what you need.
translation.zh: 如果是公立医院就有记录告诉我你到底需要什么

translation.en: Same thing. I'm looking for a patient or an employee with the name Esseker.
translation.zh: 还是那个 我找一个叫埃塞克的病人或职工

translation.en: All right, I'm on it. Give me a couple hours, and Ben, keep your head down.
translation.zh: 好的 我会去查 给我几小时还有 班 保持低调

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -Did you get it? -Yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: -拿到了吗？-是的 我想是的

translation.en: It's Anna Esseker.
translation.zh: 叫安娜埃塞克

translation.en: I didn't really know what you wanted, so I got all the medical files.
translation.zh: 我不知道你到底要什么所以我拿了所有的医疗档案 太好了 拉瑞 太好了

translation.en: This is perfect, Larry. This is perfect.
translation.zh: 太好了 拉瑞 太好了

translation.en: What happened? Did you get in an accident?
translation.zh: 这是怎么了？你出事了吗？

translation.en: Anna Esseker's file, did you have to go to city hall?
translation.zh: 安娜埃塞克的档案你要跑去市政厅才能拿到吗？

translation.en: I didn't have to go anywhere. All the files in that place...
translation.zh: 不 我哪也不用去 那地方的所有档案都和悬案证据存放在一起

translation.en: ...were in storage with the cold-case evidence.
translation.zh: 那地方的所有档案都和悬案证据存放在一起

translation.en: -Why, because of the fire? -No, no, it's before the fire.
translation.zh: 为什么？因为那场火灾？ 不是 是火灾之前的事是个完全不同的案子

translation.en: It's a totally different case.
translation.zh: 不是 是火灾之前的事是个完全不同的案子

translation.en: Anna was a patient at St. Matthew's.
translation.zh: 安娜是圣马修的病人

translation.en: She was in the psych ward run by a Dr. Kane.
translation.zh: 她住在凯恩医生主管的精神病房

translation.en: Now get this, she was only 12 years old when she died.
translation.zh: 听好了 她死时只有12岁

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: When the nurses went on their rounds first thing in the morning October 6th, 1952...
translation.zh: 1952年10月6日护士们早上第一次巡房时

translation.en: ...they discovered that all the patients had left their rooms during the night.
translation.zh: 发现所有病人都在晚上离开了房间

translation.en: They'd all gathered in the main hall. Ben, they were all dead, including the girl.
translation.zh: 他们全部聚集在大厅里 班 他们全死了 包括那女孩

translation.en: Apparently, they killed each other. I mean, it was a slaughterhouse.
translation.zh: 很明显 他们各自互相残杀那简直是个屠宰场

translation.en: That's when they closed the place down. Who knows what really happened?
translation.zh: 他们因为这个原因才关闭了医院谁知道到底发生了什么事？

translation.en: What about the doctor? Kane?
translation.zh: -那个医生呢？凯恩？-他们逮捕了他

translation.en: They arrested him. They found him dead first day of the hearing.
translation.zh: -那个医生呢？凯恩？-他们逮捕了他 听证会的第一天就发现他死了

translation.en: He slashed his wrists with a piece of the cell mirror.
translation.zh: 他用牢房的一块镜子割腕自尽

translation.en: Thanks for your help. Good luck.
translation.zh: -谢谢你的帮忙-祝你好运

translation.en: Damn it!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: "October 6th, 1952."
"Anna Esseker is diagnosed with severe schizophrenia, leading...
translation.zh: “安娜埃塞克被确诊患有严重的精神分裂

translation.en: ...to withdrawal from reality, delusional and violent behavior."
translation.zh: 引致其抽离现实出现错觉及暴力行为”

translation.en: "Pennsylvania, August 1951."
They don't match.
translation.zh: 这对不上号

translation.en: Anna Esseker was discharged from St. Matthew's Hospital October 4th.
translation.zh: 安娜埃塞克于10月4日从圣马修医院出院

translation.en: Two days before the massacre.
translation.zh: 大屠杀前的两天

translation.en: She's still alive, isn't she?
translation.zh: 她还活着 是吧？

translation.en: You almost done, sweetie? Okay.
translation.zh: 你快好了吧 宝贝？

translation.en: Why is Daddy acting so scared? It's not normal.
translation.zh: 爸爸为什么表现得很害怕？太不正常了

translation.en: He's way older than me.
translation.zh: 他比我大多了

translation.en: And I'm not acting scared, but he is.
translation.zh: 我不怕 但他怕

translation.en: Doesn't make any sense. Michael? What are you doing?
translation.zh: -这不合理啊-迈克尔 你在干什么？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: Okay, well, we gotta get going, all right? Okay.
translation.zh: -好的 我们得走了-好的

translation.en: Amy? Amy, what's wrong?
translation.zh: -艾米 怎么了？-班

translation.en: You have to come to the house right now.
translation.zh: 你得马上回家

translation.en: I'm so scared.
translation.zh: 我好害怕

translation.en: Amy, what's wrong? I'm so scared.
translation.zh: -艾米 怎么了？-我好害怕

translation.en: -Amy, just tell me what happened. -There's something in the house.
translation.zh: -艾米 告诉我怎么回事-房子里有东西

translation.en: Something in the mirrors.
translation.zh: -镜子里有东西-我马上来

translation.en: I'm on my way. Goddamn it!
translation.zh: -镜子里有东西-我马上来 真该死

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: Dad? When are you coming back home? Really soon, sweetheart. Come here.
translation.zh: -爸爸 你什么时候回家？-很快 宝贝 过来

translation.en: I love you, Daddy. I love you, too, sweetheart.
translation.zh: -我爱你 爸爸-我也爱你 宝贝

translation.en: I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我得走了

translation.en: I'm afraid to stay here.
translation.zh: 我害怕待在这里

translation.en: There's gonna be windows and mirrors wherever you go.
translation.zh: 你去哪里都有窗户和镜子

translation.en: Anything that causes a reflection right now is dangerous.
translation.zh: 所有会照出影子的东西都很危险

translation.en: At least inside the house we covered everything. It's the safest place to be.
translation.zh: 至少在房子里的我们都盖住了 这是最安全的地方

translation.en: Amy, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 艾米 对不起

translation.en: No. It's not your fault. I should've believed you.
translation.zh: 不 这不是你的错 我应该相信你

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Ben, you do whatever it takes to end this.
translation.zh: 班 你要在所不惜了结这一切

translation.en: You hear me? I will.
translation.zh: -听到了吗？-我会的

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我很快回来

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 什么事 先生？

translation.en: Excuse me. Is this the Esseker farm?
translation.zh: 打扰一下 这是埃塞克农场吗？

translation.en: What is it, Jimmy?
translation.zh: -怎么回事 吉米？-我不知道 妈妈

translation.en: I don't know, Ma. What can I do for you, sir?
translation.zh: -怎么回事 吉米？-我不知道 妈妈 -有什么能帮你的 先生？-我想找安娜 安娜埃塞克

translation.en: I'm looking for Anna, Anna Esseker.
translation.zh: -有什么能帮你的 先生？-我想找安娜 安娜埃塞克

translation.en: There's a man looking for.... You said "Anna"?
translation.zh: 有人找你说安娜吗？

translation.en: Yes, Anna Esseker.
translation.zh: 是的 安娜埃塞克

translation.en: An Anna Esseker, Ma.
translation.zh: 安娜埃塞克 妈妈

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry to bother you, I must have the wrong place.
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰到你我肯定找错地方了

translation.en: What is it you want with Anna Esseker?
translation.zh: 你找安娜埃塞克有什么事？

translation.en: I'm doing a research paper on schizophrenia.
translation.zh: 我在写一篇关于精神分裂症的论文

translation.en: I became familiar with Anna Esseker's case.
translation.zh: 我了解到安娜埃塞克的病例

translation.en: I just wanted to ask her some questions.
translation.zh: 我只想问她几个问题

translation.en: Go tell Grandpa there's a man here who's asking about his sister.
translation.zh: 告诉祖父有个男的找她姐姐

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Grandpa?
translation.zh: 祖父？

translation.en: You know...
translation.zh: 直到今天

translation.en: ...up to this day, visions of Anna's fits still haunt me at night.
translation.zh: 直到今天 安娜发作时的情景仍在夜里缠绕着我

translation.en: I helped my father fix up this part of the basement especially for her.
translation.zh: 我帮老爸为她特别弄了这个地下室

translation.en: Her fits were too violent.
translation.zh: 她发作时太暴力了

translation.en: My mother couldn't take her screams anymore.
translation.zh: 我妈再也受不了她的尖叫声

translation.en: We had every priest, doctor, healer, coming in from all over the county.
translation.zh: 我们请了全郡每一个神父医生和巫医来这里

translation.en: But no one could help her.
translation.zh: 但没人帮得了她

translation.en: Finally, a Dr. Kane from New York... ...answered my parents' cries for help.
translation.zh: 最后纽约一位叫凯恩的医生回复了我父母的求助

translation.en: He rejected the idea of demonic possession... ...said he didn't believe in it.
translation.zh: 他不接受魔鬼附身的说法说他不信这一套

translation.en: He was convinced Anna suffered from a rare form of personality disorder...
translation.zh: 他确信安娜患了一种罕见的人格障碍

translation.en: ...and mirrors could help her.
translation.zh: 镜子可以帮她

translation.en: He wanted Anna under his care, at St. Matthew's.
translation.zh: 他想安娜去圣马修接受他的治疗

translation.en: My parents were very poor, but he agreed to cover all the costs of the hospital.
translation.zh: 我的父母当时很穷 但他答应承担医院的全部费用

translation.en: Where did she go after the hospital?
translation.zh: 她出院后去了哪里？

translation.en: Don't you know?
translation.zh: 你不知道吗？

translation.en: She died there with all of Kane's other patients.
translation.zh: 她和凯恩的其他病人一起死在了那里

translation.en: Mr. Esseker, I read the file.
translation.zh: 埃塞克 我读过档案

translation.en: Anna left the hospital two days before the massacre.
translation.zh: 安娜在大屠杀前两天离开了医院

translation.en: Dr. Kane altered the documents so she could disappear.
translation.zh: 凯恩医生篡改了文件 好让她消失

translation.en: Where did you get that document?
translation.zh: 你从哪里找到的文件？

translation.en: I need you to tell me where she went after St. Matthew's.
translation.zh: 你得告诉我她离开圣马修后去了哪

translation.en: She came back and stayed with us for a while.
translation.zh: 她回来 和我们住了一段时间

translation.en: What do you mean for a while? What happened? Why did she leave?
translation.zh: 一段时间是什么意思？发生了什么事？她为何离开？

translation.en: I don't want to talk about that. Why did she leave?
translation.zh: -我不想说这个-她为何离开？

translation.en: Because strange things started to happen in the house.
translation.zh: 因为屋子里开始发生怪事

translation.en: With Anna?
translation.zh: 安娜吗？

translation.en: No, not with Anna anymore. No, she was totally cured.
translation.zh: 不 不是安娜了她已经完全好了

translation.en: Strange things started to happen with the mirrors, didn't they?
translation.zh: 镜子开始出现怪事 是吧？

translation.en: Mr. Esseker, I need to know where Anna is now, it's a matter of life and death.
translation.zh: 埃塞克先生 我得知道安娜现在在哪 此事攸关生死

translation.en: Do not make me threaten you.
translation.zh: 别逼我威胁你

translation.en: We sent her somewhere where mirrors are forbidden.
translation.zh: 我们把她送到禁用镜子的地方

translation.en: Where the mirrors couldn't find her. Where? Where?!
translation.zh: -镜子找不到她的地方-在哪？

translation.en: St. Augustine's Monastery, on the road to Reedfield.
translation.zh: 圣奥古斯丁修道院在去瑞德菲尔德的路上

translation.en: How can I help you?
translation.zh: 有何贵干？

translation.en: I'm sorry to disturb you, Sister...
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你 修女

translation.en: ...but I've come to speak with a member of your community. Anna Esseker.
translation.zh: 我是来找你们教会的一个使徒的安娜埃塞克

translation.en: Is she expecting you?
translation.zh: 你跟她约好了吗？

translation.en: No, not really.
translation.zh: 不 没有

translation.en: If you're not listed, I cannot help you, sir.
translation.zh: 如果你没预约的话我帮不了你 先生

translation.en: Can you at least tell her that I've come from New York...
translation.zh: 你能否告诉她我是从纽约来

translation.en: ...to speak with her?
translation.zh: 想找她谈话？

translation.en: I work with Dr. Kane from St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.zh: 我是圣马修医院凯恩医生的同事

translation.en: It's very important, please.
translation.zh: 此事很重要 拜托了

translation.en: St. Matthew's closed down in 1952. Who are you?
translation.zh: 圣马修在1952年就关闭了你是谁？

translation.en: My name is Benjamin Carson.
translation.zh: 我叫班杰明卡森

translation.en: I work as a night watchman on 6th Avenue in New York City.
translation.zh: 我在纽约市第六街当夜班警卫

translation.en: In the building that used to be St. Matthew's Hospital.
translation.zh: 那栋大楼原来是圣马修医院

translation.en: What is it you want, Mr. Carson?
translation.zh: 你想怎么样 卡森先生？

translation.en: My family is in danger.
translation.zh: 我的家人有危险

translation.en: And what's threatening them is asking for you.
translation.zh: 正在威胁着他们的东西在找你

translation.en: I came all this way to ask you...
translation.zh: 我从这么远而来是想问你

translation.en: ...why the mirrors that were left over from St. Matthew's Hospital...
translation.zh: 我从这么远而来是想问你 为什么圣马修医院剩下的镜子

translation.en: ...are so desperate to find you.
translation.zh: 如此迫切想找到你

translation.en: Please, Miss Esseker.
translation.zh: 求你了 埃塞克小姐

translation.en: If you don't help me, I'm gonna lose the most important thing to me in this world...
translation.zh: 如果你不帮我 我将失去这世上对我来说最重要的东西

translation.en: ...and that's my family.
translation.zh: 那就是我的家人

translation.en: Sit down, Mr. Carson.
translation.zh: 坐下吧 卡森先生

translation.en: The mirrors are merely windows on our world.
translation.zh: 镜子只是我们这个世界的窗口

translation.en: It is not the wish of the mirrors to find me...
translation.zh: 不是镜子想要找我

translation.en: ...but of what is imprisoned inside them.
translation.zh: 是困在里面的东西

translation.en: What is imprisoned inside them?
translation.zh: 镜子里困住了什么？

translation.en: At the time... ...that I was at St. Matthew's...
translation.zh: 我在圣马修的时候

translation.en: ...Dr. Kane's therapy for personality disorders...
translation.zh: 凯恩医生对人格障碍的治疗法

translation.en: ...consisted of locking the patient up in a mirrored room...
translation.zh: 其中一种就是把病人关在镜子房里

translation.en: ...for several days on end... ...forcing them to confront their own image.
translation.zh: 连续好几天强迫他们面对自己的影像

translation.en: Dr. Kane was wrong about his theory.
translation.zh: 凯恩的理论是错误的

translation.en: There is no cure for schizophrenia, Mr. Carson.
translation.zh: 精神分裂根本无法治愈 卡森先生

translation.en: It was something else.
translation.zh: 是其他东西治好了我

translation.en: And whatever it was, it left me... ...and entered the mirrors.
translation.zh: 不管那是什么东西它离开了我 进入了镜子

translation.en: Since that day...
translation.zh: 从那天起

translation.en: ...it has been collecting the souls of the people it kills.
translation.zh: 它就一直在杀人 收集这些人的灵魂

translation.en: I'm sorry...
translation.zh: 很抱歉

translation.en: ...but if I agree to go with you and return back to that place...
translation.zh: 如果我同意跟你回去那地方

translation.en: ...I will make it possible for the demon to cross the threshold...
translation.zh: 我会让魔鬼有机会 越界重回现实世界

translation.en: ...back into the real world.
translation.zh: 越界重回现实世界

translation.en: Do you understand what that means for my family?
translation.zh: 你知道那对我家人意味着什么吗？

translation.en: You can't do this, you need to come back with me.
translation.zh: 你不能这样 你得跟我回去

translation.en: I'm going to pray for you and your family.
translation.zh: 我会为你和你家人祈祷

translation.en: That's all I can do right now, Mr. Carson. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我现在只能如此 卡森先生对不起

translation.en: God bless you.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑你

translation.en: Gary Lewis, Terrence Berry, and many other men... ...have died trying to find you.
translation.zh: 加里路易斯 特伦斯贝利和其他很多人为了找你而死

translation.en: And because they failed, their families died, too.
translation.zh: 因为他们找不到你他们的家人也死了

translation.en: Two days ago, my sister was murdered.
translation.zh: 两天前 我妹妹遇害

translation.en: My family will be next if you don't help me.

translation.en: Please.

translation.en: Please. Wait, wait.

translation.en: They're beautiful.

translation.en: They're innocent, they've never hurt anybody.
